additionalDescription: Recordings taken from 161 recordings uploaded to Xeno-Canto
description:
The proposed dataset contains 1669 labeled audio files from the following
Picidae species doing 3 types of birdsongs: call, drumming and song. Audio
data are organized in thirteen folders: twelve containing the labeled audios
of each birdsong type from every Picidae specie listed in what follows and one
folder containing the background sound samples.

1- DendrocoposLeucotos - call.

2- DendrocoposLeucotos - drumming.

3- DendrocoposMajor - call.

4- DendrocoposMajor - drumming.

5- DendrocoposMedius - call.

6- DendrocoposMedius - song.

7- DendrocoposMinor - call.

8- DendrocoposMinor - drumming.

9- DryocopusMartius - call.

10- DryocopusMartius - drumming.

11- JynxTorquilla - song.

12- PicusViridis - song.

13- Silence (or background noise).
name: PicidaeDataset
